name: Dividing by a single digit integer

skills.name: Divide integers of 3 or more digits using short division
Divide integers using short division where the answer is not an integer
Times tables and their related division facts

explanations.A: I think you have stated the second remainder, rather than the number of 3s that fit into 15.
explanations.B: I think you may have added the remainder onto 5, rather than carrying it over.
explanations.C: I think you have forgotten to 'carry' your remainder of 1. We are calculating 15 ÷ 3, not 5 ÷3.
explanations.D: We cannot fit 3 into 1, so carry it over. 15/3 = 5, so the star would be 5.

explanations.A: I think you have stated the second remainder, rather than the number of 4s that fit into 27.
explanations.B: I think you may have added the remainder onto 7, rather than carrying it over to make a two digit number.
explanations.C: We cannot fit 4 into 2, so carry it over. 27/4 = 6, remainder 3, so the star would be 6.
explanations.D: I think you have found how many 4s go into 7, and forgotten to carry over the remainder from the thousands column.

explanations.B: This would be 420 ÷ 6, what would 4,200 ÷ 6 be?
explanations.C: This is the answer to 42 ÷ 6, don't forget your zeros...
explanations.D: This would be 42,000 ÷ 6, what would 4,200 ÷ 6 be?

explanations.A: This is the answer to 28 ÷ 7, don't forget your zeros...
explanations.C: This would be 28,000 ÷ 7, what would 2,800 ÷ 7 be?
explanations.D: This would be 280 ÷ 7, what would 2,800 ÷ 7 be?

explanations.A: This would be 248 ÷ 8. Don't forget 0 ÷ 8 at the end...
explanations.B: You can't do the bigger number divided by the smaller number, division is not commutative. You need to do 8s into 2, 8s into 24, 8s into 8 and finally 8s into 0...
explanations.C: You can't do the bigger number divided by the smaller number, division is not commutative. You need to do 8s into 2, 8s into 24, 8s into 8 and finally 8s into 0...
explanations.D: 8s into 2 go 0, 8s into 24 go 3, 8s into 8 go once, 8s into 0 go 0 therefore the final answer is 310

explanations.A: 6s into 2 go 0, 6s into 25 go 4, 6s into 12 go twice, 6s into 0 go 0 therefore the final answer is 420
explanations.B: You can't do the bigger number divided by the smaller number, division is not commutative. You need to do 6s into 2, 6s into 25, 6s into 12 and finally 6s into 0...
explanations.C: This would be 252 ÷ 6. Don't forget 0 ÷ 6 at the end...
explanations.D: You can't do the bigger number divided by the smaller number, division is not commutative. You need to do 6s into 2, 6s into 25, 6s into 12 and finally 6s into 0...

explanations.A: 4s into 2 go 0, carry the 2, 4s into 22 go 5 remainder 2, carry the 2 over to get 4s into 28 which go 7 and finally 4s into 4 go once so the final answer is 571
explanations.B: You have forgotten to carry the remainder 2 from the hundreds to the tens place value column...
explanations.C: You can't do the bigger number divided by the smaller number, division is not commutative. You need to do 4s into 2, 4s into 22, 4s into 28 and finally 4s into 4...
explanations.D: You have accidentally done 4 ÷ 4 = 0 at the end of your calculation but what does it actually equal?

explanations.A: You have forgotten to carry the remainders. 5s into 18 go 3 remainder 3, carry the 3 over to get 37. You now to see how many 3s go into 37.
explanations.B: You can't do the bigger number divided by the smaller number, division is not commutative. You need to do 5s into 1, 5s into 18, 5s into 37 and finally 5s into 25...
explanations.C: 5s into 1 go 0, carry the 1, 5s into 18 go 3 remainder 3, carry the 3 over to get 5s into 37 which go 7, carry the 2 over to get 5s into 25 go 5 so the final answer is 375
explanations.D: In addition to forgetting to carry the remainder 3 from the hundreds to the tens place value column, you have accidentally done 5 ÷ 5 = 0 at the end of your calculation but what does it actually equal?

explanations.A: Even though the number ends in 7 there is a remainder because you need to carry a value from the tens to the units place value column...
explanations.B: I think you have done 17 - 7 but you need to do 17 ÷ 7 and the remainder of this is the remainder of this division...
explanations.C: 7s into 4 go 0 carry the 4, 7s into 45 go 6 carry the 3, 7s into 36 go 5 carry the 1 and 7s into 17 go 2 remainder 3 therefore the remainder is 3
explanations.D: There is 4 more to get from 17 to 21, the next multiple of 7, but what you need to do to work out the remainder for 17 ÷ 7...

explanations.A: I think you have done 9 - 4 but you need to do 9 ÷ 4 and the remainder of this is the remainder of this division...
explanations.B: There is 3 more to get from 9 to 12, the next multiple of 4, but what you need to do to work out the remainder for 9 ÷ 4...
explanations.C: There is a remainder, do 9 ÷ 4 and the remainder of this is the remainder of this division...
explanations.D: 4s into 8 go 2, 4s into 6 go 1 carry the 2, 4s into 24 go 6 and 4s into 9 go 2 remainder 1 therefore the remainder is 1
